Face Painting Plus Perth

Welcome to Face Painting Plus Perth, over the last 6 years we have traveled from Mandurah to Two Rocks putting smiles on kids faces everywhere. We cater from small family events to large commercial and fund-raising events.

  • Face Painting
  • Balloon Twisting
  • Bubble-ology (big bubbles)
  • Spray and Glitter Tattoos

All of our artists come with Working With Children cards and Public Liability Insurance which are available on request.
